items: Expanded project scope to scale web application post-hackathon with a three-person group.
Deployed on Apache server using Passenger for process and resource management.
Developed backend using Express to interact with RESTful APIs; frontend developed with React.
Produced SaaS application to leverage strengths in machine learning to analyze virtual meeting engagement.
Followed Test Driven Development (TDD) cycle allowing our team to maintain above 90% test coverage.
Built website where users are able to upload videos for analysis using React, Express, and AWS.
Constructed mobile application for student-made coffee machine in collaboration with electrical engineering team.
Helped lead project development with prior React Native experience.
Demonstrated final product to 100-person audience at UCLA Creative Labs quarterly event.
